newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-E.P. WIN TOSS, BAT FIRST AGAINST GRIQUAS.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-E.P. WIN TOSS, BAT FIRST AGAINST GRIQUAS.

text.p: Eastern Province won the toss and elected to bat first in their four-day match against Griqualand West at St George's Park starting on Friday.
Eastern Province: Philip Amm, Mark Rushmere, Louis Koen, Kepler Wessels (captain), Dave Callaghan, Grant Morgan, Eldine Baptiste, Geoff Love, Quentin Ferreria, Tim Shaw, Mornantau Hayward.
Griqualand West: Mickey Arthur (captain), Martyn Gidley, Wayne Schonegevel, Pieter Barnard, Willie Dry, Ralph Koster, Cedric English, Wendell Bossenger, Brett Benkenstein, Vaughn Walsh, Garth Roe.
